lo23.data
Class PublicProfile

java.lang.Object
  lo23.data.PublicProfile
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class PublicProfile
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

PublicProfile is a copy of a Profile without the password attribute. Instances of PublicProfiles SHOULD BE generated using the Profile.getPublicProfile() method.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

PublicProfile

public PublicProfile(java.lang.String profileId,
                     java.lang.String pseudo,
                     Enums.STATUS status,
                     java.lang.String ipAddress,
                     javax.swing.ImageIcon avatar,
                     java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String firstName,
                     int age,
                     int wonGames,
                     int lostGames,
                     int drawGames)
Constructor for the PublicProfile class. This constructor SHOULD NOT be called directly. Instead the Profile.getPublicProfile() method SHOULD be used.

Parameters:
profileId - the unique profile identifier
pseudo - the player's nickname
status - the player's status
ipAddress - the player's IP address
avatar - the player's avatar (an image)
name - the player's lastname
firstName - the player's firstname
age - the player's age
